name: Light Blue Hoodie
description: Light blue hoodie with front pocket and drawstrings, featuring the Jordan logo on the chest.

name: Red Zip-up Hoodie
description: Red zip-up hoodie with a split kangaroo pocket and drawstrings, featuring a small Jordan logo on the left chest area.

name: Cream Pullover Hoodie
description: Cream-colored pullover hoodie with a high neck and drawstrings, featuring the Jordan logo on the front.

name: Grey Zip-up Tech Hoodie
description: Grey zip-up tech hoodie with high neck, black zippered arm pocket, and contrasting black details. Features a Nike Swoosh logo on the right chest and a Tottenham Hotspur crest on the left.

name: Green Pullover Hoodie with AIR Graphic
description: Green pullover hoodie with a kangaroo pocket and drawstrings, featuring a large 'AIR' graphic in a stylized font on the front.

name: Grey Zip-up Hoodie
description: A fitted grey zip-up hoodie with black accents, side pockets, and the Nike logo on the left chest.

name: Red Pullover Hoodie
description: A comfortable red pullover hoodie featuring a kangaroo pouch and the iconic Jordan logo on the upper left side.

name: Green Crew Neck Sweatshirt
description: A casual green crew neck sweatshirt with contrasting black sleeves and the Jumpman logo.

name: Yellow Pullover Hoodie
description: A vibrant yellow hoodie with a spacious hood and a relaxed fit, ideal for a sporty, casual look.

name: Pink Pullover Hoodie
description: A pink hoodie with a soft texture, a heart-shaped logo on the back, and a cozy feel.
